org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom

Class CollisionCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Circle
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Circle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.CollisionCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D, java.io.Serializable, Positionable, Sizeable, Updatable, Shape

    public class CollisionCircle
extends Circle
implements Positionable, Sizeable
    An implementation of Circle that allows for interpolation. Game objects can use this class to move around the game world and retrieve the appropriate rendering coordinates after interpolating between the previous and current position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
